title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7039.2 - Policies and procedures
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7039.2 - Policies and procedures

State Regulations

The chief administrative officer of each facility shall
develop and implement written policies and procedures to ensure compliance with
this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7039.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
